periods.name: Today
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 77, with temperatures falling to around 70 in the afternoon. North northeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 9pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 9pm and 5am. Cloudy, with a low around 52. North northeast wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.
